{ sendQuest("", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("", 8145); sendQuest("", 8147); sendQuest("", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); sendQuest("", 8151); sendQuest("", 8152); sendQuest("", 8153); sendQuest("", 8154); sendQuest("", 8155); sendQuest("", 8156); sendQuest("", 8157); // can keep going with these sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } break;
